column4: i cant make an alias to my external drive because i have a space in the path
, is there a way i can go around that?
huh? then rename it.
how'd you mount that external drive?
/dev/sda1 /media/MEDIA\040DRIVE vfat rw,nosuid,nodev,quiet,shortname=winnt,uid=1000,gid=1000,umask=077,iocharset=utf8 0 0
you need to make a new dir in media with *no spaces*, unmount your external and mount it on that new dir
